title: Agritech innovations help small farms
description: Local startups bring low-cost sensors and advisory services to smallholders.
content: Local agritech startups are building low-cost sensors and advisory services to help smallholders increase yields and reduce waste. The pilot programs show promise in several regions.

title: Education: digital classrooms expand
description: A short look at digital adoption in remote districts.
content: Schools in remote districts adopt low-bandwidth video and offline content distribution, enabling more consistent learning outcomes for students with intermittent connectivity.
